query.statement:
MERGE INTO SAPHEE.ZCST950N AS A USING ( SELECT BSU ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.SLA = 'N' THEN A.GDAYS ELSE 0 END) RPQ_DAYS ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.SLA = 'N' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) RPQ ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.SLA = 'N' AND INT(A.MON) < 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) RPQ_1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.SLA = 'N' AND INT(A.MON) >= 2 AND INT(A.MON) <= 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) RPQ_3 ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.SLA = 'N' AND INT(A.MON) >= 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) RPQ_4 ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.SLA = 'N' AND INT(A.MON) >= 4 AND INT(A.MON) <= 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) RPQ_6 ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.SLA = 'N' AND INT(A.MON) >= 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) RPQ_7 ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.SLA = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) RPQ_SLA FROM (
SELECT A.PJT, A.HNO, A.ARA, A.BSU, A.USD, A.UHJ ,SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN(A.UHJ,CAST(#GDATE# AS VARCHAR(8)),'1') MON ,SAPHEE.GET_DAYS(A.UHJ,CAST(#GDATE# AS VARCHAR(8))) GDAYS ,A.SLA FROM ( SELECT A.PJT, A.HNO, A.USD, A.UHJ , B.CS126_SLA SLA ,CASE WHEN A.IKD > #GDATE# THEN C.CS157_CAB WHEN A.IKD <= #GDATE# THEN C.CS157_CAA ELSE A.ARA END ARA ,CASE WHEN A.IKD > #GDATE# THEN C.CS157_CHB WHEN A.IKD <= #GDATE# THEN C.CS157_CHA ELSE A.BSU END BSU FROM ( SELECT A.PJT ,A.HNO ,MAX(A.USD) USD ,MAX(A.UHJ) UHJ ,MAX(A.CHA) CHA ,MAX(A.ARA) ARA ,MAX(A.BSU) BSU ,MIN(C.CS157_IKD) IKD FROM ( SELECT A.PJT ,A.HNO ,MIN(A.USD) USD ,MAX(A.UHJ) UHJ ,MAX(A.CHA) CHA ,MAX(A.ARA) ARA ,MAX(A.BSU) BSU
FROM ( SELECT A.CS126_GNO GNO , A.CS126_PJT PJT , A.CS126_HNO HNO , MIN(A.CS126_USD) USD , MAX(A.CS126_UHJ) UHJ , MAX(A.CS126_CHA) CHA , MAX(A.CS126_ARA) ARA , MAX(A.CS126_BSU) BSU
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','C') AND A.CS126_USD <= #GDATE# AND CASE WHEN A.CS126_ADT < A.CS126_USD THEN A.CS126_USD ELSE A.CS126_ADT END <= #GDATE# GROUP BY A.CS126_GNO, A.CS126_PJT, A.CS126_HNO ) A
GROUP BY A.PJT, A.HNO ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 C ON C.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = C.CS157_PJT AND A.HNO = C.CS157_HNO AND A.UHJ < C.CS157_IKD AND C.CS157_IKD >= #GDATE# AND C.CS157_GND = 'D'
WHERE A.UHJ <= #BDATE# AND A.CHA <= #GDATE#
GROUP BY A.PJT, A.HNO
) A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 B ON B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = B.CS126_PJT AND A.HNO = B.CS126_HNO AND A.UHJ = B.CS126_UHJ AND B.CS126_DDT = '' AND B.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND B.CS126_GND = 'D'
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 C ON C.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = C.CS157_PJT AND A.HNO = C.CS157_HNO AND A.IKD = C.CS157_IKD AND C.CS157_GND = 'D'
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS116_PJT PJT, CS116_HNO HNO, MAX(CS116_BMT) BMT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST116 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS116_PST = 'A6' AND CS116_GND = 'B' AND CS116_BST <= #GDATE# AND CS116_BCD <= #GDATE# GROUP BY CS116_PJT, CS116_HNO ) E ON A.PJT = E.PJT AND A.HNO = E.HNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT CS144_PJT PJT, CS144_HNO HNO, MAX(CS143_FSD) JHD FROM SAPHEE.ZCST144 A, SAPHEE.ZCST143 B WHERE A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS144_SEQ = B.CS143_SEQ AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS144_PST = 'A6' AND B.CS143_FSD <= #GDATE# GROUP BY A.CS144_PJT, A.CS144_HNO ) B ON A.PJT = B.PJT AND A.HNO = B.HNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS172_PJO PJO, CS172_HNO HNO, MAX(CS172_MDT) MDT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST172 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# GROUP BY CS172_PJO, CS172_HNO ) D ON A.PJT = D.PJO AND A.HNO = D.HNO
INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 F ON F.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = F.PJT AND A.HNO = F.HNO AND F.EXC = ''
WHERE (F.HST <> 'D' OR (F.HST = 'D' AND VALUE(D.PJO,'') > '')) AND (VALUE(B.JHD,'') > #GDATE# OR VALUE(B.JHD,'') = '' OR A.UHJ > VALUE(B.JHD,'')) AND (VALUE(D.MDT,'') > #GDATE# OR VALUE(D.MDT,'') = '') AND (VALUE(E.BMT,'') <= A.UHJ)
) A
) AS A
GROUP BY BSU
) AS B ON A.BSU = B.BSU AND A.YYYYMM = #YYYYMM# AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET RPQ_DAYS = B.RPQ_DAYS ,RPQ = B.RPQ ,RPQ_1 = B.RPQ_1 ,RPQ_3 = B.RPQ_3 ,RPQ_4 = B.RPQ_4 ,RPQ_6 = B.RPQ_6 ,RPQ_7 = B.RPQ_7 ,RPQ_SLA = B.RPQ_SLA
